arts.ttl: Sheffield Wednesday vs Oxford predictions: Owls to earn crucial win
arts.sum: It has been another challenging week for Sheffield Wednesday off the pitch but Elliott Bretland is forecasting a welcome pick-me-up for the Owls as they host Oxford United at Hillsborough.
